title: DEREK CHAUVIN TRIAL LIVESTREAM: Opening Arguments!
description:
It’s day one of the Derek Chauvin trial, and the mainstream media can’t be trusted to give you the facts. We’ll tell you what they WON’T about George Floyd and give you the TRUTH about what Chauvin is being charged with.


GET TODAY'S SHOW NOTES with SOURCES: https://www.louderwithcrowder.com/derek-chauvin-trial-1
